mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Systematic Notes on Pinanga (Palmae) in Borneo

nomenclature.name: Pinanga albescens
nomenclature.author: Becc. ex Hubert Winkler
nomenclature.type: S Borneo, between Batu Babi and Lumovia; Hubert Winkler; 2880

synonymy.name: Pseudopinanga albescens
synonymy.author: (Becc.) Burret
synonymy.bibref: (Becc.) Burret in Notizbl. Bot. Gart. Mus. Berlin- Dahlem 13: 193 (1936)

div.p: Burret (1936) established the genus Pseudopinanga and transferred Pinanga albescens to it. Following Moore (1973), I do not regard Pseudopinanga as being distinct from Pinanga.
